title: Sword Coast Legends Rage of Demons [DZ RePack]
description:
Name : Sword Coast Legends Rage of Demons
Created by : Dz Repack Team (TeRM!NaToR)

---------------------------------------------------

Size of the game 
- Final size   : 12.9 GB 
- Repack size  : 3.8 GB

---------------------------------------------------

Repack INFO
- Videos : Lossless
- Audio  : Lossless
- Texture: Lossless

---------------------------------------------------

- Game Version : v5.3.4.63704
- Cracked by   : CodEX
- Release date : 19/05/2016 
- Notes :
*This Release contains all previously released Community Packs
and Updates as well as the Rage of Demons DLC.
*We decided to pack it standalone, as a lot of game data changed

---------------------------------------------------

Installation notes : 

**(Don't mind the Remaining time for the install , The game takes 30-90ms  depends on your machine)
***(Choose more Threads number and HDD Boost for faster install)


1- Close your AV (Antivirus).
2- Make sure to close any app that may conflict with the installing .
3- start the installation , follow the screen 
4- After the game installs and finishes , Exclude the game folder from the AV
5- Run the game from the shortcut or the game folder
6- Enjoy
